post.description:
Create a new flow configuration for the authenticated client.

This endpoint allows partners to programmatically create flow configurations
with custom branding. The logo is fetched from the provided URL, optimized
for display (resized to max 400x400 pixels), and stored in S3.

Args:
    body: Flow configuration details including company name, logo URL, etc.
    client_id: Authenticated client ID from JWT token

Returns:
    Created flow configuration with S3 logo URL and preview link

Raises:
    400: Invalid request (bad config name, unreachable logo, unsupported image type)
    409: Config name already exists for this client
    500: S3 upload failure

get.description:
Check if DPAPI export data is ready and queryable.

Partners can poll this endpoint to know when user data
has been processed and is available in ClickHouse.

Args:
    uid: Partner's user identifier (partner_uid)
    client_id: Authenticated client ID from JWT

Returns:
    Status indicating if data is ready, with timestamps
Returns search history data immediately using the api_search mart view. Limited to 10,000 rows.

schema.description: Filter by ingestion timestamp (end), defaults to now()
